com.centimia.orm.jaqu
Class JaquSessionFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.centimia.orm.jaqu.JaquSessionFactory

public final class JaquSessionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This factory creates persistence session (Db) which work against a single defined data source. Multiple Factories can handle multiple data resources.

Author:
Shai Bentin
